Uses of Package
org.eclipse.ercp.swt.mobile

Packages that use org.eclipse.ercp.swt.mobile
org.eclipse.ercp.swt.mobile This package contains classes which are suitable for mobile devices. 
 

Classes in org.eclipse.ercp.swt.mobile used by org.eclipse.ercp.swt.mobile
Command
          Command is a metaphor that represents a general action.
Input
          Instances of this class represent key based input features.
ListBoxItem
          Instances of this class represent an item in a ListBox widget.
MobileDevice
          Instances of this class represent the device that is being used.
MobileDeviceEvent
          Instances of this class are sent as a result of device configuration changes.
MobileDeviceListener
          Classes implementing this interface provide methods that are called when the device configuration is updated.
Screen
          Instances of this class represent display screens available for application use.
ScreenEvent
          Instances of this class are sent as a result of screen configuration changes.
ScreenListener
          Classes implementing this interface provide methods that are called when the screen configuration is updated.
